entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
